page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: {Bishops Nympton A.F.C.} {By Robert Murch and Simon Dibble. On Tuesday week Adam Robert and Simon D. went to the building site to ask Dave Peters some questions about the Village Football team he said that they had won the second division cup and lots of others. The Football team has been going for 14 years. Some of their team have been seriously hurt with broken legs.Some of their players come from South Molton and further away in other Villages.The teams fastest player is Martin Bendo. The team is sponsored by Simple Simon Pasties,as one of the players works for the firm. They voted to have a new kit. And that was all!
